ValidationRule.description: Ensures that an opportunity marked as lost cannot be re-opened and that instead a new opportunity must be created to get someone into an onboarding journey again.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && PRIORVALUE(IsClosed) = TRUE && PRIORVALUE(IsWon) = FALSE && (IsWon = TRUE || IsClosed = FALSE) && $User.Username <> "cian@novawm.com"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot re-open or win an opportunity that was previously lost. Please contact the Salesforce team about what you are trying to do.
